Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the short cationic antimicrobial peptide family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Cationic host defense peptide that have antibacterial activity by breaking membranes. Is more effective on Gram-positive than on Gram-negative bacteria (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Comparative venom gland transcriptome analysis of the scorpion Lychas mucronatus reveals intraspecific toxic gene diversity and new venomous components.
Literature.Author: Ruiming Z, Yibao M, Yawen H, Zhiyong D, Yingliang W, Zhijian C, Wenxin L.
